review: This gadget is amazing, allowing users to stream from multiple devices. When using netflix or any other offered streaming services the experience is seamless. Their are two huge draw backs for this device the no remote and lack of supported services. It is pretty inconvenient to control the current media that is playing when multitasking on the controlling device. Navigation to the controller menu of netflix for example is a bit clunky.  A cheap roku style controller would have been great.  The lack of other streaming services is also a big con. Netflix and Google movies gets boring after a while. If you have $15 extra the lower end roku is a better buy.
author: Brandon WIlliams

review: Google chromecast is awesome. It turns your tv into a smart tv. You can access popular apps like netflix, YouTube, hulu for example. Google recently added more apps but need to add a lot more if they want to compete with apple tv and roku. All apps are controlled thru smart phone, tablet or laptop.
